attributes.action: Make people who do not work and are on benifits pay for Optitions,Dentists,Medications etc...Why should the people that actually work have to pay for stuff like that...dont you think we pay enough in taxes etc..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why dont the people who dont work and are on benifits pay for Medical bills etc....Most people dont wanna work and claim benifits because they know they wont have to pay for anything. I reckon they should have to pay and the People that actually work dont have to ay for medical bills because dont you think we pay enough in taxes and stuff, WHY??
